CustomField.description: 09/2020 - To change go to Setup < Custom Labels < Select the RVP filter and all the RVP descriptors with the Role ID's will be listed. Modify the correct Label and Role ID's.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(UserRole.Id),"None", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_West, UserRole.Id),"RVP West", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_East, UserRole.Id),"RVP East", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_Central, UserRole.Id),"RVP Central", IF( BEGINS(UserRole.Name ,"Federal"),"RVP Federal", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_Alt_Channel, UserRole.Id),"RVP Alt Channel", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_National, UserRole.Id),"RVP National", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_Retention, UserRole.Id),"RVP Retention", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_ECS"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"Sales_Support"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"Customer_Service"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"ABIS"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"MM_CS"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"_Billing_Supervisor"),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS("00E0h0000017ZjmEAE:00E0h000001Xf9PEAS:00E0h0000017ZjrEAE:00E8a000001cfkDEAQ",UserRole.Id),"RVP Customer Care", IF( CONTAINS(UserRole.DeveloperName,"Collections"),"RVP Collections", IF( CONTAINS($Label.RVP_CPE, UserRole.Id),"RVP CPE", IF( BEGINS( UserRole.Name ,"Carrier"),"RVP Wholesale", IF( BEGINS( UserRole.Name ,"Wholesale"),"RVP Wholesale", IF( BEGINS(UserRole.Name ,"BAM"),"RVP BAM","None"))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: RVP
